solution_line_template: The subscription sends twice monthly issues, so there are {issues_per_month} * {subscription_months} = <<{issues_per_month}*{subscription_months}={total_issues}>>{total_issues} issues.
Thus, the promotional offer is {total_issues} * {discount_per_issue} = $<<{total_issues}*{discount_per_issue}={total_discount}>>{total_discount} cheaper than the normal subscription.
